short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Crypto Currency Ticker for multiple crypto currencies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Live Bitcoin & Altcoin Ticker Updates directly in your browser tab. Whenever you open a new tab you will be  updated about the current price value of the currencies you are following.

This extension relies on the coincap.io API.
